title: How Innovative Grafting Technique can change the agriculture forever.

tasks.task: Understand and describe the new grafting technique for monocot plants.
subtasks: Identify the scientist and their team responsible for the breakthrough.
Explain the process of grafting involved transplanting tissue from seeds.
Describe how roots and stems are interconnected post-grafting.
Mention the types of monocot plants benefited from this technique.
Highlight the potential application in protecting Cavendish bananas from Panama disease.

tasks.task: Explain the significance of the new grafting method.
subtasks: Discuss the conventional challenges faced with grafting monocot plants.
Emphasize the innovation over existing methods and their publication.
Address the impact on food security by enhancing disease resistance in crops.
